title: "AIDS" "Cancer" "Down Syndrome"
body:
If these are the best descriptions of your feelings or emotions that you can come up with, then school has failed you.

Did you know that a lot of gamers have illnesses that keep them from leading as active lives as you?  

Do you think they want to be reminded of such illnesses and even see them used in a supposed-to-be-funny way in game?

Get some new words.  You didn't get cancer from Nidalee, and for your sake, I hope you don't ever have to say "I got cancer" in any serious way.
